hero.title: The system that simplifies your venue. And grows with you.
hero.subtitle: Appointments, staff, clients and revenue in one elegant, fast PWA. No compromises.

forWho.title: For those who work with people, not chaos.
forWho.subtitle: Your venue. Your brand. Zero confusion.
forWho.card1Desc: Appointments, staff and clients in one place. Fewer no-shows, fuller agenda.
forWho.card2Desc: Simple daily management. Automatic reminders, clear slots, data always up to date.
forWho.card3Desc: More services, more people: one system that keeps everything in order and grows with you.
forWho.microText: We also build dedicated solutions for food venues and high-turnover activities.

benefits.title: What it takes off your mind
benefits.subtitle: Less stress. More control.
benefits.b1Title: Appointments that slot in by themselves
benefits.b1Desc: Clear slots, easy changes. No double bookings, no gaps in the agenda.
benefits.b2Desc: Shared calendar, clear services and hours. Everyone knows what to do and when.
benefits.b3Desc: Automatic reminders, fewer no-shows. Clients show up and the agenda stays credible.
benefits.b4Desc: One place for appointments, revenue and data. Decisions based on numbers, not hearsay.

howItWorks.title: A clear system, no surprises.
howItWorks.subtitle: Guided setup, transparent fee. No surprises.
howItWorks.step1Desc: We configure together services, hours and branding. Your business in the app, with your logo and colours.
howItWorks.step2Desc: One fixed cost per month. Infrastructure, updates and support included. No hidden costs.
howItWorks.step3Desc: More staff, more services, more clients: the system adapts. Without changing tools.
howItWorks.setupNote: Setup cost can be spread over 6 or 12 months.

projectsCustom.title: Custom projects
projectsCustom.text: Custom projects for activities with more complex logic: food venues, pizzeria, street food, high turnover. No listed prices: every project is different. Let's talk in a consultation.

notAnyApp.title: Why it's not just any app
notAnyApp.subtitle: No compromise on experience.
notAnyApp.point1: No marketplace: clients are yours, data is yours.
notAnyApp.point2: No generic app: built for those who manage appointments and people, not for those who sell "a bit of everything".
notAnyApp.point3: No compromise on experience: one elegant, fast PWA with your brand.
notAnyApp.closing: HUBIA is not for everyone. It's for those who take their venue seriously.

ctaFinal.title: Let's talk

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Two plans: Studio (Beauty) and Operativo (Restaurant). Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months.
pricing.footer: One-time setup + monthly subscription. Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months at no extra cost.
pricing.setupIncludes: Setup includes: design, configuration, branding (logo, colours, app icon), testing and go-live.
pricing.setupMaxNote: Guided configuration and direct support until go-live.

faq.a1: Design, configuration, branding (logo, colours, app icon), testing and go-live. You can spread the cost over 6 or 12 months.
faq.q2: Can I move from Studio to Operativo?
faq.a2: Yes, the upgrade applies from the next billing cycle.
faq.a3: One-time setup at activation (spread over 6–12 months if needed) and monthly recurring fee. No long-term lock-in.

verticalPricing.title: Prices by vertical
verticalPricing.note: Barber/Hairdresser: bookings and agenda. Food: orders, kitchen, pickup. Setup can be spread over 6 or 12 months.
